skillTree.name: Agility of the Lizard
skillTree.description: Lizardmen can move with deceptive speed and agility when they have to.

skillTree.name: Protection of the Old Ones
skillTree.description: Across the gulf of space, the serene Potec has shared the secrets of time so that the Lizardmen may protect themselves against supernatural attack.

skillTree.name: Javelins and Wings
skillTree.description: When it comes to aerial combat and leading bold hit-and-run attacks, the Skink known as Tiktaq'to is peerless.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +5% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Coatl and Cold One units
	(all armies factionwide)

Speed: +5% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Coatl and Cold One units
	(all armies factionwide)

Missile damage: +10% for Skink Cohort (Javelins) units
	(all armies factionwide)

Weapon strength: +10% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Coatl and Cold One units
	(all armies factionwide)

Speed: +10% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Coatl and Cold One units
	(all armies factionwide)

Missile damage: +20% for Skink Cohort (Javelins) units
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: EYE OF THE HEAVENS
skillTree.description: Due to his role, Tiktaq'to spends long periods of time outside of the Temple-City on patrols. There are a number of Terradon aeries set throughout the jungles where the patrols can land — within half-deserted ruins, amidst the floating islands that are tethered to the clouds by mystic chains, or any of the forts that are carved into the tallest of the jungle trees. With his sharp eyes, no patrol leader has picked out as many intruders or spotted as many rampaging beasts as Tiktaq'to. (Tiktaq'to campaign only skill)

effects.description:
Number of uses: +1 for Masteries of Tlaqua army abilities
	(all armies)

skillTree.name: Drop Sphere of Tepok
skillTree.description: This magical rock causes a rather large explosion that stuns enemies, slowing them down for the kill.

ui_effects.description: ➕ Calls down 1 projectile dealing 125 25 damage and 100 25 explosion damage (8m)
➕ Enemies hit by explosion are slowed (30s)

skillTree.name: Precision Strike
skillTree.description: Having honed his senses through myriad battles, the Master of Skies strikes at the most opportune time, emboldening his forces whilst breaking the foe's guard.

skillTree.name: Fearless Leader
skillTree.description: His sheer confidence in his own abilities causes Tiktaq’to always to lead the charge, often claiming his prize with the first strike.

skillTree.name: Aerial Superiority
skillTree.description: As Master of Skies, Tiktaq’to leads only the fastest and most resilient flying beasts.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 10% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders and Coatl units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders and Coatl units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +25% for Terradon Riders units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Aeries’ Finest
skillTree.description: Only those Tiktaq’to picks by hand may fight alongside him and Zwup up in the skies above the battlefield.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +15% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders and Coatl units
	(Lord's army)

Recruit rank: +3 for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders and Coatl units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Terradon Riders units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Skink Commander
skillTree.description: As one of the greatest Skink Chiefs to fight in service of the Old Ones, Tiktaq’to takes pride in training the next generation of Skink leaders.

effects.description:
Hero recruit rank: +4 for Skink Chiefs
	(factionwide)

skillTree.name: Drop Sphere of Tepok Upgraded
skillTree.description: This magical rock causes a rather large explosion that stuns enemies, slowing them down for the kill.

ui_effects.description: ➕ Calls down 1 projectile dealing 125 25 damage and 100 25 explosion damage (16m)
➕ Enemies hit by explosion are slowed (30s)

skillTree.name: Blessing of Chotec
skillTree.description: "Whilst one brother lives in darkness, the other, his double-twin, exists in light. Behold!"

effects.description:
Construction time: -1 for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Blessing of Quetzl
skillTree.description: "By your scales be you blessed by the divine protector."

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Saurus Infantry and Temple Guard units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Blessing of Tepok
skillTree.description: "Brother of Great Tlazcotl, Tepok of the Air shall always be honoured. Let it be done."

skillTree.name: Blessing of Huanchi
skillTree.description: "Cousin of darkness, Huanchi's priests too shall dwell in twilight."

skillTree.name: Blessing of Tlazcotl
skillTree.description: "The universe resides within his reflective eyes; embrace the coldness of blessed certainty."

skillTree.name: Blessing of Itzl
skillTree.description: "Creator-meld of the beast, Itzl be praised!"

effects.description:
Leadership: +10 for Feral Cold Ones, Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Salamander, Razordon Hunting Pack, Bastiladon, Stegadon, Carnosaur, Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Dread Saurian units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -10% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Salamander and Razordon Hunting Packs, Cold Ones, Ancient Salamander, Stegadon, Bastiladon, Carnosaur, Coatl, Troglodon and Dread Saurian units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Predatory Fighter
skillTree.description: Of course, those who live to kill must also kill to live...

skillTree.name: Enforcer of Order
skillTree.description: The Plan *will* be observed, even if every member of the younger races has to die to achieve the Old Ones' goals.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Skaven
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Warriors of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Master of Skies
skillTree.description: With the utmost speed and agility, Tiktaq'to leads his death-defying Terradon squadron from atop his prized-specimen mount, Zwup.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

skillTree.name: Proud Warrior
skillTree.description: A long-serving member of an ancient, honourable tradition.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 for Saurus units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Saurus units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Saurus units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Skirmisher
skillTree.description: This seasoned warrior understands irregular combat perfectly: when to attack, when to hold back, when to withdraw behind heavier lines.

effects.description:

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Swift Rider
skillTree.description: Only the finest beast riders can hang on whilst their mounts crash through the jungle undergrowth or smash through the foe's ranks.

effects.description:
Speed: +5% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Coatl and Cold One units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +5% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Coatl and Cold One units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Terradon Riders units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Sacred Guardian
skillTree.description: It is a great honour to direct the elite warriors who protect the Plan from calamity.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 for Kroxigor, Sacred Kroxigor and Temple Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Kroxigor, Sacred Kroxigor and Temple Guard units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Kroxigor, Sacred Kroxigor and Temple Guard units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hunt Leader
skillTree.description: The most intelligent hunter tends to move swiftly up the chain of command.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 for Feral Carnosaur and Dread Saurian units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +5% for Feral Carnosaur and Dread Saurian units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Feral Carnosaur and Dread Saurian units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Feral Carnosaur and Dread Saurian units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Feral Carnosaur and Dread Saurian units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Beast Driver
skillTree.description: The largest, most aggressive creatures - usually the oldest bulls of the herd - must be directed, lest their independent spirit lead them astray.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +3% for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +3% for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units

Missile strength: +10% for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Jungle Dominion
skillTree.description: The unforgiving law of the jungle is most clear on matters of ascendancy.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Saurus and Temple Guards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for Saurus and Temple Guards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Magic resistance: 15% for Saurus and Temple Guards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Spawn-Kin
skillTree.description: Braves who emerge from the same spawning often share a deep connection – a bond which provides considerable advantages in battle.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 15% for Skinks, Chameleon Skinks, Red Crested Skinks, Salamander and Razordon Hunting Packs, Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units  (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Skinks, Chameleon Skinks, Red Crested Skinks, Salamander and Razordon Hunting Packs, Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units  (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +5 for Skinks, Chameleon Skinks, Red Crested Skinks, Salamander and Razordon Hunting Packs, Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Soul Bound
skillTree.description: Mount and rider, together as one at their very cores. Indivisible.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Cold One, Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, and Coatl units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Cold One, Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, and Coatl units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Cold One, Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, and Coatl units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Epicentrist
skillTree.description: You need to be at the very centre of this pack of furious monsters to have the minutest chance of controlling their rage. Good luck!

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Ancient Salamander, Bastiladon, Stegadon, Feral Carnosaur, Feral Troglodon and Dread Saurian units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +15 for Ancient Salamander, Bastiladon, Stegadon, Feral Carnosaur, Feral Troglodon and Dread Saurian units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +5 for Ancient Salamander, Bastiladon, Stegadon, Feral Carnosaur, Feral Troglodon and Dread Saurian units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.name: Fervent
skillTree.description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.

skillTree.name: Bonded Service
skillTree.description: The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +25
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -5% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Unit experience gain per turn: +50
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -10% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -20% for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ancient Cunning
skillTree.description: Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Geomantic Sustenance
skillTree.description: The power generated by the overarching Geomantic Web can also be used to nourish the Saurus on the march.

skillTree.name: Wary
skillTree.description: This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.

skillTree.name: Gifts of the Jungle
skillTree.description: Life in the jungle means knowing the difference between which flora can heal and what, if ingested, will kill you.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

Recruit rank: +1 for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: The Eye in the Heavens
backgroundSkills.description: The greatest Terradon rider to ever serve the Lizardmen, Tiktaq’to’s daring stunts earned him the title 'Master of Skies'.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -25% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders and Coatl units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +10 when in foreign territory
	(Lord's army)

Missile damage: +100% for Skink Cohort (Javelins) units
	(Lord's army)

items.name: Mask of Heavens
items.description: Its wearer will become one with the mighty Terradons, who will then move in tandem as a single, mighty consciousness.

effects.description: Attrition: -25% casualties suffered from all attrition
Missile resistance: +10% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders and Coatl units
